title: Готовы воплотить в жизнь дом Вашей мечты?

aboutUs.explanation: Çamlık park резиденцию в 2012 году построил Омер Кук. Инженер-механик и владелец  агенства Antalya Дом Homes. 30 лет в этой профессии

contact.header2: Мы готовы  воплотить в жизнь дом Вашей мечты!
contact.explanation2: Мы являемся интернациональной парой из Бельгии и Турции, он- корпоративный планировщик , она - веб разработчик . Зимой мы живем в Анталии, а  летом в Генте, Бельгия. Мы с удовольствием ответим на все Ваши вопросы касаемо ANTALYA ДОМ HOMES.Хотите квартиру мечты, воплотить её с нами

houses.name: Конак Двойные Башни
houses.address: Mahmutlar Mah. D-400 highway BLV. No:23A Alanya/Antalya
houses.descrLong: Проект 'Конак Двойные Башни 1' состоит из земельной площади в 3 751 м². Он состоит из 2-х блоков и 174 квартир в центре города Алания. Расположен в 200 м. от центра Махмутлара и в 20 м. от пляжа. Имеет позицию, которая доминирует над морем и видом на замок.
houses.commonAreas: Подземная парковка, дворецкий, охрана 24 часа, открытый бассейн, крытый бассейн, фитнес-центр, турецкая баня, парная, массажный кабинет, сауна, бар у бассейна, детская игровая площадка, интернет, спутниковая система.

houses.name: Дома Мечты Алания
houses.descrLong: Комплекс 'Dream Homes Alanya' является строительным проектом, который занимает площадь 1 380 м² и состоит из двух блоков. Квартиры и балконы комплекса предлагают захватывающий вид на море, горы и город благодаря их большим окнам. Вся территория комплекса красиво озеленена зеленым газоном и декоративными деревьями, что добавляет к его эстетическому очарованию.
houses.commonAreas: Сад и игровая площадка. Открытый бассейн. Фитнес-центр. Автостоянка. Охрана и видеонаблюдение круглосуточно. Центральная спутниковая система. Генератор. Интернет. Лифт.

houses.name: Дома Мечты Алания
houses.descrLong: Комплекс 'Dream Homes Alanya' является строительным проектом, который занимает площадь 1 380 м² и состоит из двух блоков. Квартиры и балконы комплекса предлагают захватывающий вид на море, горы и город благодаря их большим окнам. Вся территория комплекса красиво озеленена зеленым газоном и декоративными деревьями, что добавляет к его эстетическому очарованию.
houses.commonAreas: Сад и игровая площадка. Открытый бассейн. Фитнес-центр. Автостоянка. Охрана и видеонаблюдение круглосуточно. Центральная спутниковая система. Генератор. Интернет. Лифт.

houses.name: Парк Тема Анталья
houses.descrLong: В самом красивом районе Коньяалты, расположенном на территории в 2.414 м2 в центре города, Парк Тема предлагает спокойную и новую жизнь, сопровождаемую зеленой природой с двумя блоками и 41 квартирой… Парк Тема, представленный вам с последним подходом к завершенным проектам Park Royal, Park Maya, Park Vega и Park Mira, будет готов к заселению в марте 2020 года и будет ждать вас со своими квартирами 1+1, 2+1, 3+1 и 4+1 дуплекс.
houses.commonAreas: Для каждой квартиры будет предоставлен один парковочный место для автомобилей. Вход на парковку будет автоматической алюминиевой дверью. Для въезда на парковку будет использоваться автоматическая система проезда. Чистая вода, пожарные, бассейны и насосы будут находиться в подвале. Чистая вода будет изготовлена из нержавеющей стали. Центральная система отопления каскад будет находиться в подвале. Детская площадка, предназначенная для детей, будет оснащена камерой контролируемым видеодомофоном, который можно будет контролировать с квартиры.

houses.name: Парк Майя
houses.address: Uncalı, 1285. Sk. No:4, 07070 Bahtılı Köyü Köyü/Konyaaltı/Antalya
houses.descrLong: Located in the beautiful Konyaaltı area, Park Maya offers a tranquil and elite living experience surrounded by the natural beauty of the area. With 88 apartments spread across 11 blocks on a 15,110 square meter site in the center of the city, this development offers 3+1 apartments for an elite living space. Experience the best of both worlds with the convenience of city living and the peace of nature at Park Maya.
houses.commonAreas: Enhance your lifestyle with the luxurious amenities at Park Maya, including an indoor and outdoor swimming pool, basketball court, children's playground, fitness room, and sauna. Stay active and healthy with these on-site facilities, or relax and unwind in the comfort of your own community.

houses.name: Park Mira
houses.descrLong: Experience modern living at its finest with Park Mira, located in the beautiful Konyaaltı area of the city. This development features 1 block with 30 studio apartments, all situated on a 2,130 square meter site in the center of the city. With a focus on comfort and convenience, these studio apartments offer a perfect blend of style and functionality. Enjoy all the amenities and conveniences of city living at Park Mira.
houses.commonAreas: Enhance your lifestyle with the luxurious amenities at Park Mira, including an indoor and outdoor swimming pool, basketball court, children's playground, fitness room, and sauna. Stay active and healthy with these on-site facilities, or relax and unwind in the comfort of your own community.

houses.name: Royal Garden
houses.descrLong: The Royal Garden project, which includes six blocks with a total of 82 apartments, is located on 13 hectares of land in Kircami. Scheduled for completion in January 2023, the development offers a range of amenities including an open and closed pool, tennis court, sauna, steam room, gym, and kids club. The apartments are equipped with underfloor heating, air conditioning in every room, a kitchen with an oven and hood, automatic blinds, a smart home system, and a generator with full capacity.
houses.commonAreas: The Royal Garden project offers a range of amenities and activities for families, including a Kids Club with a playroom, resting area, steam room, sauna, fitness center, and swimming pool. These common areas provide a fun and welcoming environment for children to play and socialize, as well as a place for parents to relax and unwind. Whether you're looking to exercise, relax, or spend quality time with your family, the Royal Garden project has something for everyone to enjoy.

houses.name: Park Vega
houses.address: Uncalı, 24. Cd. 79 A, 07070 Bahtılı Köyü Köyü/Konyaaltı/Antalya
houses.descrLong: PARK VEGA is a luxurious living experience located in the heart of Antalya. Set on a 3365 sq. meter area in Konyaaltı, this development boasts three blocks and 32 apartments, each with trendsetting 2+1 living areas. PARK VEGA provides the ideal combination of location and modern amenities, offering residents a comfortable and stylish home in the heart of the city.
houses.commonAreas: Park Vega offers a range of amenities to enhance your living experience, including an indoor and outdoor swimming pool, a basketball court, and a children's playground. There is also a fitness room and sauna available for residents to use. These amenities provide a variety of opportunities for exercise, recreation, and relaxation, making Park Vega a desirable place to call home.

houses.name: Konak Twin Towers 1
houses.address: Mahmutlar Mah. D-400 highway BLV. NO:23A ALANYA/ANTALYA
houses.descrLong: The Konak Twin Towers 1 project is situated on a 3,751 sq. meter plot of land in the heart of Alanya. The development consists of two blocks containing a total of 174 apartments. Located just 200 meters from the center of Mahmutlar and 20 meters from the beach, this property boasts stunning views of the sea and castle. Its central location and proximity to local amenities make it a highly desirable place to live.
houses.commonAreas: The Konak Twin Towers 1 project is equipped with a range of amenities to enhance the living experience of its residents. These amenities include a covered parking area, a concierge, and 24-hour security. The development also has both an indoor and outdoor swimming pool, as well as a fitness center, Turkish bath, steam room, massage room, sauna, pool bar, and children's play area. Additionally, the project offers internet access and a satellite system. These amenities provide opportunities for exercise, relaxation, and entertainment, making Konak Twin Towers 1 a desirable place to call home.

houses.name: Konak Twin Towers 2
houses.address: Kizlar Pinari Mah. Spor Cad. NO : 25 A/B , 07400 Alanya/ANTALYA.
houses.descrLong: The Konak Twin Towers 2 Project is situated on a 2,902 sq. meter plot of land in the center of Alanya. The development consists of two blocks with a total of 115 apartments, including 1+1 and 2+1 standard units as well as 2+1, 3+1, and 4+1 duplexes. Located just 900 meters from the center of town and 600 meters from the Kleopatra Beach, this property boasts stunning views of the sea and castle. Its central location and proximity to local amenities make it a highly desirable place to live.
houses.commonAreas: The Konak Twin Towers 2 development offers a range of amenities to enhance the living experience of its residents. These amenities include a covered parking area, a concierge, and 24-hour security. The development also has both an indoor and outdoor swimming pool, as well as a fitness center, Turkish bath, steam room, massage room, sauna, pool bar, and children's play area. Additionally, the project offers internet access and a satellite system. These amenities provide opportunities for exercise, relaxation, and entertainment, making Konak Twin Towers 2 a desirable place to call home.
